subject: URGENT: Q4 Budget Review Meeting - Need Your Approval
body:
Hi,

I hope this email finds you well. We need to schedule an urgent meeting to review the Q4 budget proposal before the deadline on Friday.

Could you please:
1. Review the attached budget document?
2. Confirm your availability for a 30-min call this week?
3. Let me know if you have any initial concerns?

This is critical for our planning cycle and I need your approval ASAP.

Thanks,
John
